content.text:
# List of prime ministers of the Democratic Republic of the Congo__disambig_1

This is a list of prime ministers}} of the Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly the Republic of the Congo and Zaire) since the country's independence in 1960.
The current Prime Minister is Judith Suminwa, since 12 June 2024; she is the first woman in the post.
List of officeholders
